name: Bunny Pancake Café Game
description:
Hello everyone! And welcome to Bunny Pancake Café, the furry animals favorite place in the world!!

Bunny Pancake Café is a very simple kawaii yet challenging game where you can play with cute kawaii furry animals and make them all nice and chubby! We’ve created six furry kawaii friends, so you can play the game with multiple animals to make chubby, that are: Bunny, Bear, Lion, Kitty, Horse (check out this chubby one haha) and Pig. There are also many kinds of different desserts, so you must be aware of which food each of the animals likes best.

This kawaii game, Bunny Pancake Café, is very simple to play: move your finger left/right to serve the correct food to your furry cute animals, that way they will get more chubby. Discard the food they don’t like by moving your finger up/down. Grab power ups to boost your gameplay! Make the highest score so you can be in world’s top 5!! We have very competitive players so far!!

But be careful, power ups sometimes look like cute food you would discard if you don’t pay attention: power ups have an orange glow around them, so whenever you cute furry animals get this food, think fast and don’t hesitate, feed them the power up! To make things easier, there is a panel in the main menu as a reminder to see all the possible desserts that will boost your animals! These are: Muffin, Red velvet and Doughnut!! So kawaii!

FEATURES
● Unlock new animals!
● Unlock new backgrounds!
● Become the best in the world ranking!
● Share your achievements!
● Training mode available!

We’ve had so much fun making Bunny Pancake Café because first, we love furry cute kawaii animals when they get chubby, second, we love food (who doesn’t like a warm delicious pancake??) Third, we decided all the desserts would be cute and sugar free. Why? Because we wanted to haha! We hope you love this Bunny Pancake Game too!


Follow us in our social media for insight on future releases!
